task.title: Shutdown Services
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to stop all Eucalyptus services.

step.cmd: Log in to the CLC host and shut down the CLC service.
Log in to an SC host and shut down the SC service.

info.p: Repeat for any other machine hosting an SC.

step.cmd: Log in to the Walrus host and shut down the Walrus service.
Shut down the services on the CC host.

info.note: This command shuts down any CLC, Walrus, and SC components co-located with the CC, and in the correct order.

step.cmd: Log in to a CC host and shut down the CC service.

info.p: Repeat for each machine hosting a CC.

step.cmd: Log in to each NC host and shut down eucanet.
In each NC shut down the NC service.

info.note: Running instances on the NC will continue running.
info.p: Repeat the last two steps for each machine hosting an NC.
